DOC.brief_summary: The project is aimed to develop predictive indices of spinal cord injury severity through the analysis of cerebrospinal fluid of patient collected during acute injury.
DOC.brief_title: Prognostic Value of Biochemical Markers in Cerebrospinal Fluid for Functional Outcome of Spinal Cord Injured Patients
DOC.criteria: presence of cervical and thoracic Spinal Cord Injury need to be submitted to spine surgical stabilization with posterior approach prior to recruitment, in the acute phase, treatment with steroid therapy
